type.description: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc

typeCode.description: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown

issuedBy.description: Internet of logistics identity code of issuing party.

key.description: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

WeightChargePaymentIndicator.description: Code indicating whether Weight / Valuation Charges  payment will be made at origin (PREPAID) or at destination (COLLECT)

OtherChargePaymentIndicator.description: Code indicating whether Other Charges payment will be made at origin (PREPAID) or at destination (COLLECT)
